### *Currently*

I am a M.S. student studying biostatistics at Mailman. My interest is mainly in statistical decision theory and optimization with applications in health policy, economics, and population health. I formerly studied mathematics, biology, and political science at UT Austin.

### *Autobiography*

I was born and raised in Guangzhou, China.
